My Dream Home

#10 utility room
#1 kitchen
#2 bath
#3 guest bedroom
#4 living room
#5 master bedroom
#6 walk-in closet
#7 bath
#8 home office
#9 balcony

Dreamhome explained!


#1 kitchen would have a robot that can cook any recipe from internet.

#2 bath whenever we will enter lights will turn on and almost everything can be opperated with voice commands.

#3 Guest Bedroom will have motion sensors to turn on/of lights,air conditioning

#4 Living Room will have a huge t.v which can be operated by voice commands.

#5 Master Bedroom will have to control for the entire home.

#6 Walk-in Closet with motion sensors to turn on/of.

#7 bath whenever we will enter lights will turn on and almost everything can be opperated with voice.

#8 Home Office will have sensors to turn on/of the lights and to automatically turn on my machine/desktop

#9 Balcony would be normal (>‿◠)✌.

#10 Utility room there cv will be used to keep track of how many items are left and i will be informed accordingly through alexa.

Made with sass and pug.
